1.name: Match and combine offline data sources
1.description: Data from offline data sources can be combined with your online activity in support of one or more purposes

2.name: Link different devices
2.description: Different devices can be determined as belonging to you or your household in support of one or more of purposes.

3.name: Receive and use automatically-sent device characteristics for identification
3.description: Your device might be distinguished from other devices based on information it automatically sends, such as IP address or browser type.

1.name: Use precise geolocation data
1.description: Your precise geolocation data can be used in support of one or more purposes. This means your location can be accurate to within several meters.

2.name: Actively scan device characteristics for identification
2.description: Your device can be identified based on a scan of your device's unique combination of characteristics.
